message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with secure transmission of messages over a broadcast channel using network coding techniques. This involves information theory (cs.IT) as well as networking (cs.NI) concepts. The paper also discusses security against computational brute-force attacks (cs.CR) and considers two different scenarios for recovering missing packets - centralized and decentralized (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes a new method for decentralized retransmission using network coding, which involves system and control theory (cs.SY) concepts.
